block.p: American League BALITMORE ORIOLES--Sent C Willie Morales outright to Rochester of the International League. Announced OF Karim Garcia refused an outright assignment and elected to become a free agent. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Exercised the option on RHP Gil Heredia for the 2001 season.

American League BALITMORE ORIOLES--Sent C Willie Morales outright to Rochester of the International League. Announced OF Karim Garcia refused an outright assignment and elected to become a free agent. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Exercised the option on RHP Gil Heredia for the 2001 season.

National Basketball Association BOSTON CELTICS--Waived G Michael Jordan. DALLAS MAVERICKS--Exercised the option on the contract of F Dirk Nowitzki for the 2001-02 season. LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Released F Andy Panko and G Shawn Respert. MINNESOTA TIMBERWOLVES--Signed G Sam Jacobson.
Women's National Basketball Association CLEVELAND ROCKERS--Named Amanda Ludwig director of public relations.
National Football League PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Placed RB Jon Witman on injured reserve. Activated FB Dan Kreider from the practice squad.
Arena Football League AFL--Approved the sale of the New England Seawolves to majority owners Rogers Communications Inc., who will relocate the team to Toronto, where they will be renamed Phantoms.
Canadian Football League WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Signed LB Lamar McGriggs. Xtreme Football League SAN FRANCISCO DEMONS--Named Mike Church defensive coordinator.

USA HOCKEY INLINE--Announced the resignation of Brian Williams, director, so he can become vice president and chief operating officer for Portland of the AHL. National Hockey League CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Re-assigned F Blair Atcheynum to Chicago of the IHL. LOS ANGELES KINGS--Recalled D Andreas Lilja from Lowell of the AHL. Placed C Stu Grimson on injured reserve. NEW YORK RANGERS--Waived D Jason Doig. Recalled D Dale Purinton and D Jason Bannister from Hartford of the AHL.

American Hockey League AHL--Suspended Philadelphia RW Jessee Boulerice six games, Philadelphia LW Todd Fedoruk three games and Albany D Willie Mitchell one game for their actions in a game on Oct. 15. Suspended Hershey RW Mike Craig three games for a high-sticking incident in a game on Oct. 14.
